price: As for those who believed and did righteous deeds, they will be rejoicing in a garden [of Paradise].
arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَهُمۡ فِي رَوۡضَةٖ يُحۡبَرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
